tweet_text: Phineas and Ferb could have potentially developed the vaccine already.
As a vaccine checker at my venue, a couple asked me "vaccine for what?" which surprised me.
When I asked the nurse administering my vaccine if I could use my own bandaid, she responded, "I don't see why not." However, it turned out that there was a reason why she shouldn't have allowed it.

In 1955, when the polio vaccine was introduced, people eagerly queued up to receive it. At that time, artificial satellites were still two years away from being launched. Fast forward to 2021, we have access to external world-brains through our smartphones and robots have been sent to Mars. However, some individuals believe that the COVID vaccine contains harmful substances.
My mom said that she felt an increased appreciation for science after receiving her second vaccine shot today.
A young ballet student asked me if I was excited to get the Covid-19 vaccine soon. They referred to it as the "Fauci Ouchie" and I thought it was adorable.
Lindsey Graham received a vaccine before me, despite my profession as a nurse.
Johnson & Johnson applied their knowledge of creating 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner to develop their vaccine.

My 10-year-old was nervous as he received his Pfizer vaccine tonight. However, he kept whispering his best friend's name, who is high-risk, repeatedly. I don't regret that my child was scared but still did it out of love for his friend.
Dolly Parton contributed to the funding of the COVID vaccine, so it's important to take it instead of refusing it.
My horse has worms and the pharmacy only has COVID vaccines in stock.

My aunt passed away from COVID-19 recently. She was a lawyer who was close to retirement and had received all her vaccines. Despite not being sick for very long, she unfortunately succumbed to the virus. She was a strong advocate for helping women who were victims of domestic violence and had volunteered at the House of Ruth for many years. Her passing is a great loss and she will be missed dearly.

I had a long conversation with @BillGates where we talked about various topics such as India's fight against Coronavirus, the work of @gatesfoundation in battling COVID-19, the importance of technology and innovation, and the production of a vaccine to cure the pandemic.

Pfizer has been very protective of the details of their international COVID-19 vaccine agreements. However, someone has managed to obtain one of these agreements and is sharing it online under the hashtag #PfizerLeak.
My cousin received the vaccine and three days later, they accidentally stepped on a Lego. I'm not implying that the vaccine caused their foot to hurt, but it's important to do your own research.
The mRNA vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna are scientifically impressive. Some people have asked me to explain how they work, so I will attempt to do so while I wait for a patient.

There are many myths circulating about COVID-19, and one of them is that the virus will disappear during the summer months. However, this is not true as previous pandemics did not follow weather patterns. Additionally, as we enter summer in the Northern Hemisphere, there will be winter in the Southern Hemisphere, making the virus a global issue.

BTS made a comeback at #UNGA and conveyed a strong message about climate action, COVID-19 vaccines, and the significance of self-care and community welfare. Their words have inspired the youth, and we can work together to build a better world. #BTSLoveMyself
If the vaccine posed a risk, it would have been administered to individuals with lower socioeconomic status before being given to those in positions of power and wealth.
The FDA has approved the first COVID-19 vaccine for individuals aged 16 and above to prevent the disease.
While working at a thrift store, I came across a vaccine card from 1956, which felt surprisingly relevant.

The ER is currently experiencing a surge in COVID-19 cases due to the highly transmissible Delta Variant. The majority of patients admitted to the ICU have not been vaccinated, and many express regret for not doing so.

I received the COVID-19 vaccine today and my arm is a bit sore. It will help protect me and others from the virus. Erica Hill mentioned that I have been getting vaccines since I was young, which I didn't realize.

I received my first COVID-19 vaccine dose at AIIMS and was impressed by the quick work of our doctors and scientists in fighting the pandemic. I encourage all eligible individuals to get vaccinated and help make India COVID-19 free.
The Omnicron variant highlights the need for equitable vaccine distribution, as COVID will continue to persist if wealthy countries and pharmaceutical companies continue to impede access to vaccines.
The person is not lying and has shared their before and after pictures after getting vaccinated. They feel that not enough people are talking about their experiences.

Oxford University initially planned to make their vaccine open source, but later decided to sell exclusive rights to AstraZeneca after being convinced by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. However, AstraZeneca is facing challenges in delivering the vaccine, which is causing difficulties for poorer countries in accessing it.
When I received the vaccine, I told the person administering it that I was feeling "updog." They then removed the syringe and did not give me the vaccine.
Vaccine passports were once known as immunization records and there was no controversy surrounding them.

I don't understand how some people see masks and vaccines as the biggest threat to American freedom, when there are other issues like the 40-hour work week, rent, college tuition, police, and Ryan Seacrest that are more pressing.

This is the story of a 66-year-old researcher who immigrated to the United States. Despite rarely receiving grants and never having her own lab, she dedicated four decades of her life to studying mRNA, a path that many considered foolish. Throughout her career, she never earned more than $60,000. However, her hard work and dedication paid off as her research became the foundation for the Pfizer and Moderna COVID-19 vaccines.

Jin stated that he and his fellow members are vaccinated and understand the concerns of those who fear vaccines due to their novelty. However, he believes that progress cannot be made if people are afraid of the past. President Moon smiled at BTS's statement.
Politicians should acknowledge the historical medical abuse of Black people that has led to a lack of trust in vaccines, instead of simply stating that the Black community doesn't trust them.
For years, KFC's 11 secret herbs and spices went unquestioned, but now people are curious about the ingredients in the Covid vaccine.
There is a video that suggests that there may be a discrepancy in what was initially said about the vaccine's ability to stop transmission and what is being said now.

If elected president, I will enforce mask mandates across the country, make sure that everyone has access to consistent and free testing, and speed up the process of creating treatments and vaccines. My priority will be to quickly and effectively manage the spread of the virus.
Some individuals refuse to receive the vaccine due to uncertainty about its contents, yet they consume hot dogs without hesitation.

Some individuals are concerned about the speed at which the vaccine was developed in just nine months. Instead, we should consider what other advancements could be made if scientists didn't have to spend a significant amount of time seeking funding and support.

A doctor in Alabama has shared that some of her Covid patients, who are on the verge of being intubated, have expressed regret for not getting vaccinated and have begged her for the vaccine. The doctor says she holds their hand and sympathizes with them, but unfortunately, it's too late for them to get vaccinated at that point.

The USA, UK, and European Union have blocked the manufacturing and importation of affordable versions of the covid vaccines in Global South countries, which is devastating news for those who have been fighting for this right.

The CDC has reported that 94% of individuals who died from coronavirus had underlying health conditions. The number of deaths solely attributed to Covid-19 is less than 10,000. Some individuals believe that the pandemic is a hoax and that Democrats used it to manipulate the election by implementing measures such as mask mandates and economic shutdowns.

The high number of vaccinations administered today is a positive development in the fight against COVID-19. The vaccine is still the most effective tool we have in this battle. Congratulations to those who received the vaccine and thanks to the frontline workers who made it possible. India should be proud of this achievement.
Please refrain from stating that the vaccine has no serious side effects. I received my vaccinations and am currently able to continue working.

The vaccines did not appear out of nowhere. They are the outcome of years of fundamental research in various fields, utilizing the vast knowledge of humanity. This is the process of science, and it is remarkable. The failure lies in the communication of this information, which has led to tragic consequences.

The World Health Organization has approved the first malaria vaccine, which has the potential to save many children in sub-Saharan Africa. The search for this vaccine has been ongoing for a century, and a WHO representative has called the approval a "historic event."
The most uncomfortable part of getting vaccinated was having to remove my Blink 182 sweatshirt and revealing that I was also wearing a Blink 182 t-shirt.

Governor Abbott's handling of the pandemic and vaccine rollout has resulted in the deaths of over 44,000 Texans. Additionally, his prioritization of energy company profits over the safety and well-being of Texans has led to fatalities from extreme weather conditions. Many believe that Abbott's actions are putting the lives of Texans at risk.

Vaccines are considered unnatural, but so are many other things such as eyeglasses, air travel, surgical anesthesia, scuba diving, air conditioning, purified water, bullets, television, microwaves, and shoes.

Our recent investigation features a whistleblower who participated in Pfizer's crucial COVID-19 vaccine trial. The whistleblower's testimony raises concerns about the accuracy of data and the effectiveness of regulatory supervision.

The fact that the two vaccines approved for emergency use in India are made in the country is a source of pride for all Indians. It demonstrates the commitment of our scientific community to realizing the vision of a self-reliant India, which is founded on empathy and concern for others.

Using the suffering of those who were subjected to criminal medical experiments in Auschwitz to argue about vaccines, pandemics, and those who work to save lives is disgraceful. It shows a lack of respect for the victims and is a troubling sign of declining morals and intellect.

I got vaccinated for Covid-19 yesterday evening and celebrated by dancing Bhangra on a frozen lake. I hope my joy and positivity spreads across Canada and beyond for the benefit of everyone's health and wellbeing.

An mRNA vaccine does not contain the virus. It is like an email sent to the immune system that provides information about the virus, how to eliminate it, and then disappears like a Snapchat message. This technology is impressive.
The decision made by the President to enforce vaccine mandates is a courageous one that will have a positive impact on both public health and the economy. If you agree, please retweet. 🇺🇸
It's surprising that people who stockpiled toilet paper and flour during the pandemic for survival purposes are now hesitant to get vaccinated.
Today was a great day as I waited in line. I urge those who are eligible to sign up and get vaccinated. Let's all stay safe and healthy.

A 6-year-old came to the vaccine clinic and confidently sat down, telling the nurse to proceed with the vaccination. He even tore off his shirt to make it easier. His boldness impressed everyone and made them a little afraid of him.
Ron DeSantis gave a full answer on the distribution of vaccines by Publix, Walgreen's, and CVS, which was later edited by 60 Minutes.

Chloe Mrozak, a 24-year-old from Illinois, was arrested for allegedly using a fake COVID-19 vaccine card to enter Hawaii and bypass travel restrictions. The card had a misspelling, reading "Maderna" instead of "Moderna."

A federal judge has rejected the FDA's request to release Pfizer's Covid vaccine data at a slow rate of 500 pages per month. Instead, the judge has ordered the FDA to release the data at a much faster rate of 55,000 pages per month. The judge's decision can be read in a 3-page document.

According to a study, the effectiveness of Pfizer and Moderna vaccines against Omicron after three months is negative. The study suggests that individuals who received the Pfizer vaccine are 76.5% more likely to be infected with Omicron, while those who received the Moderna vaccine are 39.3% more likely to be infected compared to unvaccinated individuals.

Nine months ago, I collapsed at home two weeks after receiving my first AstraZeneca vaccine. As a previously fit and healthy person with no underlying health issues, I experienced severe complications from the vaccine, including the loss of my left leg above the knee and other health issues. Despite these challenges, I am grateful to be alive.

It is concerning that some African countries are unable to vaccinate their citizens due to the stockpiling of vaccines by the United States and the European Union, which may not be in use or accessible to their own citizens.

It's concerning that private pharmaceutical companies have monopolized the development of a vaccine that could benefit the entire world, yet we casually mention their names like it's a harmless trend.

The purpose of the booster shot was not to reduce symptoms, but rather to uphold the belief that the vaccine could prevent the spread of COVID-19. This belief was the foundation for vaccine mandates, but it has been challenged in recent times.
I received my first COVID-19 vaccine today and feel grateful to live in a region where it's available. However, I'm aware that vaccine distribution is unequal globally.

The Covid Passport is not just a simple vaccine verification system. It has the potential to create a national caste system and a surveillance network that is unprecedented in history. It is important to understand the implications of this system and to fight against it.

A new study has found that vaccines and natural immunity are effective in neutralizing COVID variants. This is good news for everyone except for those in positions of power who may have used fear to control people. The study specifically looked at neutralizing antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 variants.
It's amusing to see people who are against vaccines. Vaccines are considered to be one of the greatest accomplishments of humanity, as they have prevented a significant amount of human suffering.

The Blackfeet Nation in Montana gave away 750 extra COVID-19 vaccines to residents in Alberta, Canada. A mobile clinic was set up at the border crossing and people drove for hours and lined up for miles to receive the vaccine.
Thank you for visiting, Olivia, and for encouraging young people to get vaccinated. By getting the COVID-19 vaccine, we can all contribute to defeating the virus. Let's take action together.

I am currently on a flight to the Bay Area and I find it concerning that unvaccinated individuals are allowed to fly. It poses a risk to everyone on board and contributes to the spread of the virus. Requiring vaccination for air travel seems like a necessary measure to help prevent further transmission.

The author addressed journalists who confronted them in Congress and criticized natural immunity, urging them to read the science. They then shared an article by a Harvard epidemiologist who argues that the case for COVID vaccine passports has been weakened.
I regret getting vaccinated because it has led me to have more fun and spend more money than I intended.
My friends and I are excited to receive the vaccine.

Please trust the vaccine and the data, and consider getting vaccinated. It is important to continue following SOPs as well. The COVID-19 pandemic is now affecting mainly those who are unvaccinated, and we need to work together to ensure the safety of everyone.
The first shipment of coronavirus vaccine from Pfizer's facility near Kalamazoo, Michigan has been loaded onto UPS and FedEx trucks and is now on its way.
Vaccine passports create a division in society based on personal health choices and are discriminatory. They have not achieved their intended purpose and have caused harm to society.

As a person who was sent to an internment camp in America due to my race, I find it ridiculous to hear people label vaccine requirements as fascism. I have experienced actual fascist policies and know what it is like to suffer under them. This is not fascism.

The proposal suggests giving $1500 to everyone who gets vaccinated, which would serve as both a stimulus check and an incentive to get vaccinated. The hope is that more people will get vaccinated, which will save lives and also provide financial assistance. The estimated cost of $400 billion would be offset by the economic boost from ending the pandemic. The proposal is being shared on social media with the hashtag #vaccinestimulus.

Dr. Malone, the inventor of mRNA vaccine technology, is a respected scientist who has expressed his views on Covid vaccines. While it is uncertain whether his views are correct or not, he has the right to express his scientific opinion. Suspending him is unjustified and a disgraceful act.
It is suggested to refer to them as immunization records instead of vaccine passports as they have always been required for jobs and school.

If someone is publicly speaking out against the vaccine but has already received it themselves, they are a hypocrite. They are not considering the harm they may cause to those who listen to them and choose not to get vaccinated, putting themselves and others at risk.
The most accurate explanation of how mRNA vaccines function is that they instruct the body to create a specific protein and then trigger an immune response against it.
The FDA and CDC have recommended a pause in the use of the Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine as a precautionary measure.

It is true that I am not aware of the contents of the vaccine. Similarly, I am not familiar with the ingredients of Hydroxychloroquine, Robotissin, tea, anointing oil, or the blood of Jesus. I am also uncertain about the components of people's thoughts and prayers. However, I do consume hot dogs.

Jonathan Isaac of the Orlando Magic has stated that he will not be receiving the Covid vaccine as he believes he already has natural immunity and the data suggests that he is not at risk from the virus.
Stephen A. Smith contracted Covid and had to be hospitalized due to severe symptoms. He credits the vaccine he received for saving his life as he believes that he only narrowly avoided death.
Seattle firefighters and police officers who were terminated for not adhering to the vaccine mandate are currently providing food to the homeless.

A study conducted by Cleveland Clinic on 52,238 employees has found that there is no significant difference in the re-infection rate between unvaccinated individuals who have had COVID-19 and those who have had COVID-19 and received the vaccine.

Jimin from BTS has made a generous donation of KRW 100 million to Rotary, which will help provide more children with access to polio vaccines. His talent and generosity will support the efforts of WHO and its partners to end polio.

The Dow has surpassed 36,000 and unemployment has decreased from 6.3% in January to 4.8%. The country has added over 5 million jobs, which is a record. Additionally, 220 million vaccines have been administered in just 10 months. However, only 30% of the population believes that the US is on the right track. This suggests that the Democratic Party may have a messaging issue.

I spoke with @POTUS today about the significance of young people receiving vaccinations. Visit the website to gain knowledge about vaccines and locate a vaccination center nearby. It's a simple, cost-free, and crucial step to take.

The Biden administration has confirmed that 20 million doses of the Covid-19 vaccine are missing. Earlier, there were suspicions about the federal vaccine supply being lower than expected, and it was suggested to look to Jared for answers. This suggestion is reiterated.
Norway has returned to normalcy without any mask mandates, vaccine mandates, or social distancing requirements. This is due to following scientific guidance.
Vaccine mandates are causing some teachers, nurses, and cops to quit due to their personal beliefs. However, some people see this as a positive outcome.
Joe Rogan is not a scientist, so it's best not to take his statements too seriously. Up next, the Jonas Brothers and Big Bird are encouraging everyone to get vaccinated.

When I called Ted Cruz's office to schedule an appointment with the Senator to discuss my blood pressure, they informed me that he was not qualified to provide medical advice and suggested that I contact my doctor instead. I then requested that they refrain from offering advice on vaccines in light of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

Stanley Johnson, who repeatedly broke lockdown rules, has received his second vaccine dose before many vulnerable individuals have received their first. This highlights the hypocrisy, cronyism, and elitism of the current Conservative government.
A teacher in Utah was fired for allegedly calling Trump a "moron" and advising her conservative students to take the vaccine and stop watching FOX News. There is a call for her reinstatement.
My friends and I plan to get the vaccine.

This thread discusses why vaccinated individuals are still contracting COVID-19. The vaccines were created to combat the original strain of the virus, but a mutated strain (delta) became dominant by the time vaccination efforts were increased.
The vaccine aims to reduce the severity of symptoms and hospitalizations, prevent overcrowding in hospitals, and lower the risk of death.

Wisconsin Republican legislator Andre Jacque, who authored bills prohibiting mask and vaccine mandates, has been intubated and is battling for his life on a ventilator after contracting COVID-19 just days after attending a contentious committee meeting without a mask. If you have been vaccinated, retweet.
I am requesting that we spread the message that I am calling for an immediate and total prohibition on all vaccine mandates.

Joe Biden did not mention anything about naturally acquired immunity, which recent data suggests is more long-lasting than the vaccine. Approximately 100 million Americans are estimated to have naturally acquired immunity. Some people believe that this omission is not scientifically justified and is dishonest. They feel that the government does not care about this issue.

A new variant of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, known as C.1.2, has been discovered in South Africa and other countries. There are concerns that this variant may be more infectious and could potentially evade vaccines. Additionally, the mutation rate of C.1.2 is nearly twice as fast as other variants.

Kevin Durant has tested positive for Covid-19, leaving the Nets with limited eligible players. Kyrie Irving, who has not received the Covid vaccine, may be the only player available to play. Some media outlets previously criticized Irving for his decision not to get vaccinated.
The Daily Show clip showing people opposing seat belt mandates in the 80s is bizarre when viewed in today's context of debates over masks and COVID vaccines.

Believing in possibilities and hope can help us navigate unexpected situations and find new paths. UNICEF's supporters, BTS, discuss the COVID-19 pandemic, vaccines, and the choices we must make for a better future at the UNGA.

The writer's mother had a negative response to both Covid-19 and the vaccine, resulting in the amputation of her lower legs and the likelihood of losing most of her hands. The family is seeking assistance with medical expenses and accommodations to ensure her comfort. They are grateful for her survival and appreciate any support.

American and Southwest Airlines have announced that they will continue to enforce vaccine mandates despite the ban imposed by Republican Governor Greg Abbott. They have stated that they will follow the orders of the Biden administration.
The work done by @SethMacFarlane and the Family Guy team is excellent. If someone still doesn't understand how vaccines work after watching it, I don't know what else to say.

During the Supreme Court hearing today, some justices repeated misinformation about COVID-19. Justice Sotomayor stated that 100,000 children were in critical care and on ventilators, which is not accurate. Justice Breyer suggested that a vaccine mandate would prevent 100% of COVID-19 cases in the US, which is also not true. Justice Sotomayor also claimed that COVID-19 deaths are at an all-time high, which is not entirely accurate.

The number of Covid-related deaths in the US over the past two years has surpassed the number of deaths caused by AIDS between 1981 and 2000. Despite the availability of a vaccine, the situation is alarming and future generations may find it hard to believe that a nation could be so ignorant and indifferent towards such a large-scale loss of life.

I recently viewed an advance copy of a whistleblower video from @projectveritas that is about to be released. It is highly recommended that anyone who was terminated or denied a religious exemption for the vaccine mandate should watch it. The video is extremely impactful.

The University of Connecticut has announced that students who do not receive the vaccine will face fines and internet access restrictions. Some people believe that there are negative aspects to the vaccines, but it is up to each individual to decide whether or not to get vaccinated.

The COVID-19 virus is not affected by the calendar, so there will be no sudden change on January 1st, 2021. The pandemic can only be slowed down and eventually stopped through measures such as vaccines, wearing masks, and avoiding large gatherings. It is our actions, not the passage of time, that will bring an end to the pandemic.

Scientists at Walter Reed Army Institute of Research have reportedly developed a vaccine that can protect against COVID-19 and its variants, including Omicron. The vaccine is called the Spike Ferritin Nanoparticle COVID-19 vaccine (SpFN).

A federal judge has ruled in favor of a Kentucky hospital system's COVID vaccine mandate, rejecting a legal request by anti-vaxxer hospital employees to end the mandate. These employees will now be fired for refusing to comply with the mandate, which the judge deemed necessary to protect patients and coworkers. The judge's decision has been praised by supporters of vaccination.

The person administering my vaccine presented the Moderna vial to me in a professional manner, similar to a sommelier presenting a bottle of wine. I became flustered and simply responded with "yes, perfect, thank you."

Healthcare workers, including nurses, doctors, and orderlies, put their lives at risk during the pandemic and deserve better treatment. They worked tirelessly until vaccines arrived, and it's unfair for them to be treated with disrespect by those who may need their care in the future.
It's important to not be picky about which vaccine you receive. Pfizer and Sinovac are both effective options and should be accepted without hesitation.
Vaccine mandates are causing some teachers, nurses, and police officers to quit or retire due to their personal beliefs.

There is a figure circulating in Italy that some people claim shows the diagram of a 5G chip that has been inserted into the COVID vaccine. However, the figure actually depicts the electric circuit of a guitar pedal. It is important to note that this claim is false and has no basis in reality.

In Calgary, some restaurants and bars are asking for proof of vaccination to allow customers to sit on their patios. As a result, some people are choosing to bring their own food and having picnics on the street.

Scientists have conducted successful trials in animals for a potential vaccine against Alzheimer's disease. Memory loss in mice was reversed, and the researchers are eager to proceed with human trials.

Tonight, I will express my disagreement with the mandatory vaccination of NHS staff and the implementation of vaccine passports. I believe that these measures will be counterproductive and may lead to division at a time when we need to work together and stay united.
Vaccines were responsible for eradicating polio and smallpox, as they never achieved herd immunity.

The writer's 5-year-old daughter, who has a weakened immune system due to cancer and a transplant, did not develop antibodies after receiving vaccines. The writer emphasizes the importance of vaccination, wearing masks, and taking the pandemic seriously to protect vulnerable individuals like their daughter.

The Director of the Medical Ethics Program at UC Irvine, who is also a physician, has been placed on leave by the University of California for challenging their vaccine mandate in court. The individual has shared the details of the situation in a post.

To effectively contain the virus and its impact, it is necessary to have humility, a well-defined vaccine strategy, and financial assistance. The government's approach of being overconfident and hiding the truth is resulting in the loss of many lives.

The author's brother was against getting vaccinated, but unfortunately, he passed away on August 31st due to COVID-19. Recently, his wife also passed away from the same disease. The author urges everyone to get vaccinated and wear masks to prevent the spread of the virus.

Texas schools have reported over 50,000 confirmed cases of coronavirus among students in a short period of time. Due to the spread of the disease, several school districts have temporarily closed. Additionally, Texas has recorded 59 child deaths related to COVID-19 as of September 3.

The NFL is currently prioritizing vaccines for its players, who are some of the most physically fit individuals in the world. However, there are ongoing issues of systemic abuse among both current and former players that also require attention.

Today, I visited a vaccination center at Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia Hospital in India, where citizens are receiving vaccines that bring pride and protection to their lives. This marks a significant milestone in India's vaccination efforts.

Emmanuel Macron, Justin Trudeau, and Joe Biden are working together to promote vaccinations and vaccine passports. Some people believe that they are using fear to achieve this goal. However, others disagree and support their efforts. The situation is causing controversy and debate among Western citizens.
I respect people's decision to get vaccinated, but I personally choose not to. I have a strong distrust of Big Pharma and their motives. I am in good health and not afraid of contracting Covid-19.

It is being claimed that false information was given to encourage people to get vaccinated, and now false information is being given again to avoid admitting the mistake. Instead of blaming the unvaccinated, individuals should reflect on their own gullibility.

A police chief in North Carolina has been suspended without pay for two weeks and put on probation for six months after instructing his officers to visit a clinic where they could obtain fake vaccination cards. There are calls for him to be fired.

There is currently no FDA-approved COVID-19 vaccine available in the United States, and Pfizer has not announced any plans to release one in the near future. This information has been verified through fact-checking sources, including pharmaceutical companies and government agencies.
The Moderna/NIH vaccine was created in partnership with President Trump on January 13, 2020. This is good news for America and the world.

Yesterday, @archiemanners and I convinced Piers Corbyn, who is against vaccination, to accept £10,000 that he believed was from AstraZeneca in exchange for him to stop criticizing their vaccine. However, we used monopoly money and recorded the entire interaction.

The Biden administration is reportedly warning Marines that they may lose certain benefits, such as pensions, tuition assistance, and access to the G.I. bill, if they choose not to receive the COVID-19 vaccine. Some have criticized this move as an example of medical tyranny.
Please refrain from stating that the vaccine has no significant side effects. I received both doses and am now able to socialize with my friends without any issues.

AT&T has announced that it will require its employees to be vaccinated and has set a deadline for compliance. Those who do not comply may face termination. This makes AT&T the largest private company in the US to mandate vaccines for its workers.

There is promising news that a potential vaccine for multiple sclerosis is in development by BioNTech, the maker of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine. The vaccine is an mRNA vaccine and has shown positive results in mice, improving symptoms and halting the progression of MS.

Twitter should not be the one to judge Dr. Malone. As the inventor of mRNA vaccine technology, his concerns should be taken seriously. If Big Tech and Big Pharma have a different perspective, they are welcome to express it. However, censoring experts who speak out should not be allowed. The hashtag #RestoreMaloneNow is calling for his reinstatement.

The speaker expressed frustration with finance professionals who seem to lack empathy and ethical considerations. During a conversation about the US not lifting vaccine patents, one finance bro responded that there was no financial incentive to do so and that human life was not a motivating factor. The speaker found this attitude concerning.

United Airlines has announced that it will terminate the employment of 600 workers who have refused to comply with the company's vaccine mandate unless they change their stance and receive the vaccine. If you support United Airlines' efforts to maintain safety in the skies, please retweet.
Protesters gathered on São Paulo's Paulista Avenue to demand vaccines, food, and the impeachment of Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro.

BBC presenter Lisa Shaw passed away due to complications from the AstraZeneca Covid vaccine, according to a coroner's report. Shaw, a healthy mother of one, experienced headaches a week after receiving her first dose of the vaccine and subsequently developed blood clots in the brain, which ultimately led to her death.

The issue of people refusing to get vaccinated but then seeking medical help when they contract COVID-19 is worth discussing. If someone doesn't have enough faith in doctors to follow their recommendation to get vaccinated, why do they suddenly trust them when they become sick with the virus?
Accumulate vaccines, promote unequal vaccine production, allow for the emergence of new variants, and then impose bans and isolation measures.

Governors were informed by @HHSgov that there was a strategic reserve of vaccines. Recently, the public was told that the reserve would be released to increase the supply of vaccines. However, it seems that there is no reserve. The Trump administration needs to provide an explanation for this discrepancy.
75% of Americans have been vaccinated, but COVID cases have increased by 300% compared to last year when there was no vaccine.

The situation in TN is concerning as out of 50 swabs taken in an ER, 47 tested positive for COVID-19 and none of the patients were vaccinated. Despite this, they still refuse to get vaccinated. It is frustrating and it seems like there is no way to convince them otherwise.

Joe Biden's presidency has faced several challenges, including a gas crisis, a border crisis, closed schools, rising inflation, and an attack on Israel. Crime rates have also increased in major cities. Additionally, he has been credited with the vaccine efforts initiated by his predecessor. It has been announced that taxes will be raised.
I met a man from Israel who showed me his vaccine passport on his smartphone. He expressed confusion about why Americans tend to politicize everything. I agreed with him.

Since March 2020, I have worked in the ICU in Washington, Arizona, and Ohio, traveling with experienced medical teams to areas with high demand. Every time, we witness a recurring pattern: patients with damaged lungs on the right side that could have been prevented with just two doses of a vaccine.

America's Frontline Doctors has filed a lawsuit in federal court to seek a temporary restraining order against the use of the COVID-19 vaccine in children. The organization aims to protect civil liberties and the right to bodily integrity.

I support vaccines and have received them myself. However, I do not believe in mandating vaccines or requiring vaccine passports. I believe these measures are unethical and lack evidence to support their effectiveness. I am confused as to why some people see these beliefs as conflicting.

In 1952, polio caused the deaths of 3,145 Americans. A vaccine was developed in 1955, and all states passed laws mandating vaccination for school entry. In 2020 and 2021, COVID has caused the deaths of 345,000 and 416,000 Americans, respectively.

The FDA has officially approved the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine after a thorough evaluation of its safety and effectiveness. It is recommended that individuals get vaccinated to help bring an end to the pandemic.
I am excited for the activation of the vaccine chips and the possibility of everyone chanting "all hail Plankton" together.

The CEO of The Daily Wire, Jeremy Boreing, stated that although the company has over 100 employees, they will not comply with Joe Biden's vaccine mandate, which they believe is unconstitutional and tyrannical. They plan to resist the mandate using all available means, including legal action.
